name: SyncStone
description: Export FINAL FANTASY XIV official blog 'The Lodestone' entries to Markdown format. Includes images and comments with bulk export support.

features.title: Markdown Export

features.title: Bulk Export

features.title: Chrome Extension
features.description: Run directly from browser. Install and use immediately.
